title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 2100.1 - Statement of purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 2100.1 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

This Part sets forth the policies and procedures governing
the earned eligibility program. Consideration for this program is available to
any inmate serving an indeterminate sentence with a minimum term of not more
than eight years. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
2100.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
